trans-unit.source: Professional Slider-Plugin
Can be used with the "jQuery-FractionSlider", the "Professional jQuery Content Slider Plugin - Slider Pro" or the "Slider revolution".
Slide
Title of the slide
Optional subtitle of the slide
Fixed background image
Or fixed background color
data-in (Fractionslider) / data-transition (Slider Revolution) attribute: animation
Elements for this slide
Fractionslider Effect
data-position attribute. Format: “top,left” in pixels. E.g. 100,500. [px,px]
data-in attribute
data-out attribute
data-ease-in attribute. E.g. linear, swing or easeInBack.
data-ease-out attribute. E.g. linear, swing or easeOutBack.
data-delay attribute: time before the in transition starts (in the current step). [ms]
data-time attribute: time after which the elements animation is complete. [ms]
data-step attribute: you can group your elements in different steps.
data-special attribute: cycle will trigger the out transition for the previous element in the current step.
CSS class
Name
Description
Slider Pro Effect
Sets the width of the layer. Can be set to a fixed or percentage value (px or %).
Sets the height of the layer. Can be set to a fixed or percentage value (px or %).
Sets the depth (z-index, in CSS terms) of the layer
Sets the position of the layer
Sets the horizontal position of the layer, using the value specified for data-position as a reference point (px or %)
Sets the vertical position of the layer, using the value specified for data-position as a reference point (px or %)
Sets the transition of the layer when it appears in the slide
Sets an offset for the position of the layer from which the layer will be animated towards the final position when it appears in the slide
Sets the duration of the show transition [ms]
Sets a delay for the show transition [ms]
Sets the transition of the layer when it disappears from the slide
Sets an offset for the position of the layer towards which the layer will be animated from the original position when it disappears from the slide
Sets the duration of the hide transition [ms]
Sets a delay for the hide transition [ms]
Sets how much time a layer will stay visible before being hidden automatically [ms]
Slider Revolution Effect
data-x value: Horizontal Layer position within the Layer Grid Container [px,"left","center","right"]
data-y value: Vertical Layer position within the Layer Grid Container [px,"top","center","bottom"]
data-start value: start time [ms]
data-whitespace value: line break mode
data-width value: Width of the layer [px, "none", "auto", array]
data-height value: Height of the layer [px, "none", "auto", array]
data-hoffset value: Offset horizontally from the Layer position
data-voffset value: Offset vertically from the Layer position
data-responsive_offset: Defines how offset values (hoffset,voffset) should act on responsivity.
data-basealign value: Defines if the Layer should be aligned to the Layer Grid container, or to the Slide.
Slider-Part
Title of this element
Optional subtitle of the slide
Optional text for the link (button-text)
Link
Image
Or: relation to a tt_content element
CSS styles
CSS class
Fractionslider effects
Slider Pro effects
Slider Revolution effects
